title: Game-Based Mobile Language Training: Utilizing Real-Time Cues and Pre-Learning Videos

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and game interface usage experience
context.additional_context: Microlearning course for in-service professionals to improve language skills, requiring a design that combines gamification and real-time feedback in smartphone environments, with flexible scheduling considering learners' work commitments.

learning_goals: Through game mission performance, learners can appropriately utilize over five specialized language expressions per week in situational contexts.
By leveraging real-time cues, learners can achieve over 80% accuracy in in-game decision-making.
Through pre-training videos, learners can reduce core information search time during game-based learning by 30%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
